summary: Build a professional resume/portfolio website for Consuelo Ayala (traditional artist and amateur chef) featuring art projects and a food projects section, with an artistic logo and specific gallery links.
architectural_notes: Content must reflect no work experience and high school graduate status; focus on skills, bio, and projects.
Do not create a "featured art pieces" category; keep projects as art pieces plus a separate Food Projects section.
Site logo should be updated to use the user-provided profile picture image asset (replacing the custom art-forward logo).

existing_features.title: Create a single-page professional resume/portfolio website for Consuelo Ayala with clear sections: Hero/Intro, Bio/About, Skills, Projects (Art), Food Projects, and Contact (simple contact details/CTA without external email integrations).
Implement the Bio/About section using the provided BIO text verbatim (English), with professional typography and readable layout.

Add a Skills section with the following constrained lists only: Artistic Mediums (Watercolor, Acrylic, Graphic), Culinary Skills (Baking, Stovetop Cooking), Creative Skills (Color Theory, Attention to Detail, Creative Problem Solving), Personal Strengths (Self-motivated, Continuous Learning, Patience, Dedication, Creative, Artistic Vision, Kind, Usually Very Optimistic).

Create an Art Projects section where the featured projects are art pieces, and include two externally linked project cards: “Abstract Art Collection” linking to https://photos.app.goo.gl/dP3yhDpvjBr6QLj77 and “Alcohol Marker Illustrations” linking to https://photos.app.goo.gl/5s7KtgtZb9rjvpbM7.
Do not include any category or section labeled “featured art pieces” anywhere in the UI.
Create a Food Projects section with an externally linked entry labeled “Food Projects” that links to https://photos.app.goo.gl/Ziw3x1pQm3neoCaN9.

Design and apply a coherent, creative visual theme appropriate for a traditional artist and amateur chef (avoid blue/purple as dominant colors), including consistent typography, spacing, and section styling across the site.
Make the site logo more artistic by adding a custom, art-forward logo asset and displaying it in the header/hero area alongside the name “Consuelo Ayala.”
Add an Education section that states high school graduation (English), without inventing schools/dates unless explicitly provided by the user.
Update the site’s overall visual theme to feel “weird, colorful, yet pretty” while keeping it cohesive and professional for a portfolio.

Revise global styling tokens (CSS variables / Tailwind color usage) to support a brighter, more varied color palette (multiple accent colors) and apply it consistently across components (Card, Badge, Button, icons, separators).
Add/replace decorative background/overlay visuals to reinforce the “weird, colorful, yet pretty” aesthetic without reducing readability (keep a subtle overlay or blending to preserve legibility).
Create a new static logo image asset from the uploaded profile photo (WIN_20260211_10_47_53_Pro.png) and add it under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Update the Hero/Header logo in frontend/src/App.tsx to use the new profile-photo logo asset instead of /assets/generated/logo-consuelo-ayala.dim_512x512.png, and ensure the logo displays cleanly in a circular presentation consistent with the existing hero styling.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a professional resume/portfolio website for Consuelo Ayala (traditional artist and amateur chef), tailored for a high school graduate with no work experience

Add skills sections with constraints: Artistic Mediums (watercolor, acrylic, graphic), Culinary Skills (baking, stovetop cooking), Creative Skills (color theory, attention to detail, creative problem solving), Personal Strengths (self-motivated, continuous learning, patience, dedication, creative, artistic vision, kind, usually optimistic)
Add Bio/About section using provided BIO text
Add Projects section where featured projects are art pieces, and explicitly do not include a "featured art pieces" category
Add external links: "Abstract Art Collection" -> https://photos.app.goo.gl/dP3yhDpvjBr6QLj77 and "Alcohol Marker Illustrations" -> https://photos.app.goo.gl/5s7KtgtZb9rjvpbM7
Create a Food Projects section and link it to https://photos.app.goo.gl/Ziw3x1pQm3neoCaN9
Design/update the site logo to be more artistic
Update the site aesthetic to be weird, colorful, yet pretty (overall visual theme refresh)
Replace the current artistic logo with the user’s provided profile picture (use as site logo in header/hero)
